sentence: I’m a boots-on-the-ground, actual cop.” As McCarthy and his allies weigh Katko’s successor on the committee, they can look to one prominent example of a Freedom Caucus member who came into their fold: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), a co-founder of the famously combative group.
title: Freedom Caucus members square off for a plum post with all eyes on McCarthy

sentence: I’m a boots-on-the-ground, actual cop.” As McCarthy and his allies weigh Katko’s successor on the committee, they can look to one prominent example of a Freedom Caucus member who came into their fold: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio), a co-founder of the famously combative group.
title: Freedom Caucus members square off for a plum post with all eyes on McCarthy

sentence: It cannot be emphasized enough: This was coming from a caucus that counts among its members the likes of Reps. Jim Jordan, Andy Biggs, Paul Gosar, Matt Gaetz, Jody Hice, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Louie Gohmert, Madison Cawthorn, and Lauren Boebert.
author:
Darrell Lucus
Community
title: Freedom Caucus member: Jan. 6 could have been 'a stake in the heart of the federal republic'

sentence: I’m going to side with the Jim Jordans — the tip of the spear in Washington.” Another consideration for McCarthy, as he makes a play for the speakership, is who will support him and who could threaten his push to secure the role next January if Republicans retake the House.
title: The primary foreshadowing the future of the GOP

sentence: The California Republican dropped out of the running for speaker in 2015 amid opposition from the ultra-conservative House Freedom Caucus, which Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio led at the time.
author: Warren Rojas
title: CPAC candidates want to weigh their options for House speaker if elected. Colleagues say Kevin McCarthy's still in good shape.

sentence: I respect that.” Bishop, who is also a member of the Judiciary Committee and good friends with ranking member Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), noted there is a “particular logic that makes sense” in the possibility of him chairing Homeland.

title: Exclusive: Freedom Caucus Members Jostle for Top Post on Immigration Oversight Panel

sentence: As CNN's Zanona points out, controversial Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) is already in line to take over the chairmanship of the powerful House Judiciary Committee "with all the subpoena power that comes with it."

title: Chairman of House Freedom Caucus endorses Mo Brooks – He ‘fights unwaveringly for our conservative values’

sentence: “Congressmen like Jim Jordan, Scott Perry, and others in the Freedom Caucus need conservative fighters to work with them in the House, and they know that Casey Wardynski is the only candidate in this race that will stand with them and further an America First agenda.” “The Freedom Fund endorsement is highly sought after, and we’re glad that after thoroughly vetting the AL-5 field they recognized Casey Wardynski as the true conservative in the race,” he added.
author: Dylan Smith
title: House Freedom Caucus political arm endorses Casey Wardynski in AL-5 race

sentence: Among the GOP lawmakers named by Hutchinson as taking part in such discussions were Reps. Scott Perry, R-Pa., Louie Gohmert, R-Texas, Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and Matt Gaetz, R-Fla.

title: Ex-aide: GOP lawmakers met with Meadows on Trump's Jan. 6 plans

sentence: On a planning call that included Mark Meadows, White House chief of staff; Rudy Giuliani, Trump’s personal lawyer; Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio; and other Freedom Caucus members, the group discussed the idea of encouraging supporters to march to the Capitol, according to one witness’s account.

title: Filing provides new details on Trump White House planning for Jan. 6
